shrimp.name: AnisoCTorrance
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Cook-Torrance shading model, with Heidrich-Seidel microfacet distribution function, meant to be coupled with an isotropic specular term, such as Phong for instance. Specular term only, this should be composited in a network with an ambient and a diffuse term. Cs not considered, since this is will be part of the ambient/diffuse terms. Opacity needs to be part of the network as well.
